election_record.label: New York 1821 State Senate, Middle District

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: Farrand Stranahan received 1 vote as Farrand Stanahan.
Wells Lake received 1 vote as Wells Lare.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: Archibald MacIntyre received 1 vote as A. MacIntyre.

sub_unit.name: Monroe
sub_unit.note: The Farmer April 30, 1821 lists A. MacIntyre with 95 votes.

sub_unit.name: Otsego
sub_unit.note: Archibald MacIntyre received 1 vote as A. MacIntyre.
Farrand Stranahan received 1 vote as Errand Stranahan.

sub_unit.name: Ulster
sub_unit.note: The Ulster Plebeian (Kingston, NY) lists a total for Archibald MacIntyre as 1239 votes but the town totals add up to 1226.
Archibald MacIntrye received 113 votes as Archiblad M. Intyre.

election_record.reference: Orange County Patriot; or, the Spirit of Seventy-Six (Goshen, NY). April 30, 1821.
American (For the Country). New York. July 17, 1821.
Spirit of the Times (Batavia, NY). July 27, 1821.
